M12=0005
M13=0010
I12=0010
I2=0000
M5=0001
R3=0002
R4=0003
R5=0001
CALL(M12,I12)
CALL(M12,I12)
CALL(M13,I12)
IDLE
NOP
FINISH

.CALL(0015)
R3=R3+R4
RTS

.CALL(0020)
R3=R3-R5
DM(I2,M5)=R3
IF NE JUMP(M13,I12)
RTS

.MEMCHECK
0000 0007
0001 0006
0002 0005
0003 0004
0004 0003
0005 0002
0006 0001
0007 0000
